availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Leonard Clements (Ellis County, Texas, farmer.)

body.p: Ellis County, Texas, farmer. Union County, Kentucky, native. Son of Walter Leonard Clements and Martha Payne Clements. Married to Tabitha Christian Bell Clements in Union County on September 11, 1858. Father of Jake Clements. Married to Mary Smith Clements in Ellis County, Texas, on October 18, 1860. Father of Joseph Leonard Clements. Farmer in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Ellis County, Texas, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
